page.title: 17The Leiston Surgery.
page.content: In Leiston Main street stands the Surgery which was opened in l982.Part of it occupies an old Victorian building which was renovated recently and with the new extension forms the doctors surgery. Inside there are 14 rooms.5 doctors work there and serve 6600 patients.The area covers 144 sq miles.ll0 people call in each day to visit a doctor, 15 to see a nurse and 70 to pick up medicines. There are 4 nurses and all work part time.The centre is open from 8.30am - 6.30pm Monday to friday and in the morning on Saturday.If there is an emergency at night there is always someone on call l50 medicines are regularly used but several hundred occasionally. Children come in because of falls and for accidents with bikes,roller skates.The nearest hospital is at Ipswich 25 miles away.
